lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony attended Syracuse for one year, leading the Orange to the N.C.A.A. title as a freshman. He was the third overall pick in the 2003 N.B.A. draft by the Denver Nuggets.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony attended Syracuse for one year, leading the Orange to the N.C.A.A. title as a freshman. He was the third overall pick in the 2003 N.B.A. draft by the Denver Nuggets.
